title: ELEX
notes:
No Meddling: Game Crashes instantly with a Wine error Box dropping a .dmp file.

With Meddling: Using PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% as a start up option you get to see the intro videos. After that the game freezes to black screen and opens 6 wine error boxes in the background which have to be forcibly closed.

title: ELEX
notes: Does stutter a bit out of the box even with high framerates. After disabling the compositor the game runs smooth as butter.

title: ELEX
notes: Starts without errors. Performance is playable but not great. Max. 30FPS

title: ELEX
notes: Had some weird error when i first started it, after a system restart it is running flawlessly (only minor FPS drops during cut scenes).

title: Elex
notes: Main menu worked on start, seemed to work pretty well / starting a game crashed when joining the world and I couldn't get to main menu afterward / None

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-041806-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
title: ELEX

notes: Facial animations are completely borked, wont launch with a controller plugged in.
title: ELEX

notes:
First launch after intros has long frozen screen while shaders are being compiled.
DXVK.80 increased reliability of the game considerably. Hasn't crashed since.
title: ELEX

notes: I never played this on windows so I cannot testify if it runs at native performance. However I run a pretty outdated rig (see my system info) and I can play this game without problems with FXAA, everything to medium and High render distance. Game works out of the box with Proton beta. No tweaks required.
title: ELEX
